page_not_found.title: Page not found
page_not_found.msg: If you ended up here, you've either clicked on a faulty part of the application or entered an invalid address.

not_authorised.title: You are not authorised for this feature
not_authorised.msg:
If you ended up here then you have attemped to access a feature for which you have no access permission.

You need to be logged in with %s permission.

not_logged_in.title: Not logged in
not_logged_in.msg: If you ended up here then you need to login.
